examples.example: 当你发现自己的想法不对时，及时改正会收获更好的结果。

translate.english: When you find that your own idea is not right, correcting it in time will gain better results.

examples.example: 遇到困难时，不要总觉得自己的方法不对，要勇于尝试和探索新路径。

translate.english: When encountering difficulties, don't always feel that your own method is wrong, but be brave to try and explore new paths.

examples.example: 如果觉得自己的方向不对，那就及时调整，相信总会走向正确的道路。

translate.english: If you feel that your direction is not right, then adjust it in time, and believe that you will always move towards the right path.
